Name: Roshni

Name: Tess Jacob
Heading: St Joseph’s College
Review: Pratibha college fest was conducted in April and it allowed many students to showcase their talents in a variety of different events. The library is known to be the highlight of SJC with a wonderful collection of books. The classrooms are big and airy. There is a chalkboard, smart class, big benches, and windows. There are several sports and extracurriculars, and associations. The open heart is a student-run social group created as an initiative for a good cause. Everything is student-run but teachers guide us through it.
